## decryptToken() function

Decrypts a compact JWE string and returns the VaultClaims payload.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function decryptToken(key: Uint8Array, jwe: string): Promise<VaultClaims>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

key


</td><td>

Uint8Array


</td><td>

32-byte symmetric key (AES-256)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

jwe


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

Compact JWE string to decrypt


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[VaultClaims](./vaultkeeper.vaultclaims.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Decrypted VaultClaims

## Exceptions

VaultError if decryption fails or the payload is malformed
